mapper.select: INSERT INTO member( user_id, user_pwd, user_name, email, phonenum1, phonenum2, postnum, address1, address2, birth, gender, regdate ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{email}, #{phonenum1}, #{phonenum2}, #{postnum}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{birth}, #{gender}, sysdate() )
